item.title: Basic Pentesting
item.description: A writeup of TryHackMe’s Basic Pentesting Room

item.title: Kioptrix
item.description: Kioptrix is a vulnerable machine from VulnHub. Setup #Once we have downloaded the files from Vulnhub, we can import the virtual machine into either Virtual Box or VmWare.

item.title: Adguard on a Pi
item.description: In a recent post, we setup docker on a Raspberry Pi. In this post, we will look into how we can use docker to run a few nice to have services, at home in a quick and easy manner.

item.title: Installing Docker & Docker Compose on Raspberry Pi
item.description: What is Docker & Docker Compose ? #Docker is method to easily deploy and maintain applications in containers. Containers are isolated prepackaged environments that include all dependancies required to run a certain piece or set of software.
